description: Erection of a single storey rear extension at lower ground floor level, along with internal modifications to the building. Creation of a new bin store platform at ground floor level to front light well area. Alterations to existing front railings and the erection of new railings to the side of the proposed bin store platform. Associated works and alterations.
decision_conditions: REASON: The removal of the chimney breast, alterations to internal layout and plan form, erection of a bin store platform at front ground floor level, and alterations to the front railings at ground floor level, would by reason of loss of historic fabric, plan form and impact on external appearance of the Listed Building would be harmful to the significance of the designated heritage asset contrary to policy HE.9.4 of PPS5 (Planning for the Historic Environment) and Historic Environment Planning Practice Guide, Strategic policy 9 of Islington's Core Strategy 2011, Policies D4, D8 and D11 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, guidance contained within the New River Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002, the Islington Urban Design Guide 2006 and the guidance contained in London Terrace Houses 1860-1660.
